summary: Five years before the events in the television series take place, Rui and Vani meet and fall in love on the day of their respective wedding ceremonies - to different people, in the same church.
cast: Luiz Fernando Guimarães|Fernanda Torres|Marisa Orth|Evandro Mesquita|Emilio Pitta|Tutuca|Lupe Gigliotti|Fabiana Gugli|Ana Baird|Mário Schoemberger|Antônio Destro|Anderson Carvalho|André Falcão|Antônio Fragoso|Cláudio Cinti|Fernando Vieira|Ana Velloso|Marcelo Borghi|Careca|Cristiano Lima|Jota Farias
title: Os Normais: O Filme
